longBusinessSummary: Khadim India Limited manufactures, wholesales, and retails footwear in India. The company offers formal, casual, sports, ethnic, school, and labour shoes; sandals and floaters, slippers and flip-flops, flats, heels, and ballerina, as well as leather accessories that include wallets and bags. It offers its products under the Khadim's, British Walkers, Lazard, Turk, Pro, Sharon, Cleo, Waves, Softouch, Adrianna, Bonito and Schooldays brands for men, women, and children. The company also sells its products online. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Khadim Chain Stores Limited and changed its name to Khadim India Limited in August 2005. Khadim India Limited was incorporated in 1981 and is based in Kolkata, India.
